Nothing but problems with this. I tried this on 2 different rigs, one with AV, & one without, they both encountered the same issue:

End result is a folder about 1.41gig and an unplayable game, don't bother with this torrent.

@PseudoPositive

There are 3 possibilities.

Your torrent encountered an error, which could result in corrupted files. Perhaps you're having ancient hardware which can't handle the installation. Or you're simply lying!

Rip installs without any issues on our PCs. We guarantee it works perfectly. It's up to downloaders who to believe, a VIP or just some user.

@Shroo, I've DL'd some of your other torrents & had no issues, I've tried this 4 times now, firstly extracting with 7zip, then a second time with HJ-Split, everything seemed ok till the install process. I'm using Win7 32bit with 4gig ram, 2.66GHz core 2 duo CPU with all needed softwares for playing games up to date. The install gets to 40% then I get that error message (both rigs), you may have Uarc etc on your PC, that's why it works for you. I'm not lying about my statement, I would rather it worked, & I post a, "thanks Shroo" remark here, I don't troll, I just wanted the game. Maybe it was a torrent error, but that would not explain the clean pre-install extraction, hope it worked for others though.
